channel.title: Hosting On Linux
channel.description:
I have a problem with running my .sh file
[code] #!bin/bash
java -Xmx100m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server [/code]
I get the error : command not found.... server.server And after 10 miliseconds I get a list of different items.
Can't explain it better the errors only show for 10 milisec.

item.title: Hosting On Linux
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

I have a problem with running my .sh file

#!bin/bash

java -Xmx100m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server

I get the error :
command not found… server.server
And after 10 miliseconds I get a list of different items.

Can’t explain it better the errors only show for 10 milisec.

Read full topic
